quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Woman and Actor
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, line. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which movie star said the following words: I had to break up with him because he had an incurable disease. I didnt know it was stupidity!?

options.text: Meg Ryan in Youve got mail!
Susan Sarandon in Thelma and Louise

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sandra Bullock in Miss Congeniality

questions.question: I killed a helicopter with a car. Who am I?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John McClane

questions.question: Which actress delivered this movie line: You break my heart. Then again you break everyones heart.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Demi Moore to Rob Lowe

questions.question: I shot up an entire police station full of cops just to kill one woman for something she might have done in the future. Who am I?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Terminator

questions.question: I shot a man at close range through his head with a bow and arrow. Who am I?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rambo

questions.question: In a 1993 comedy/drama, Johnny Depp starred as the son of a morbidly obese woman with this last name.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grape

questions.question: Which actor said the following words: One must go to a bowling alley to meet a woman of your stature.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Gielgud to Liza Minelli

questions.question: Which movie star delivered the following line: Let off some steam Bennett?

options.text: Chuck Norris in Missing in Action II
Harrison Ford in Air Force One

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arnold Schwarzenegger in Commando

questions.question: Which actor delivered the following movie line: I reckon Im looking at a tin star with a drunk pinned on it!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Wayne to Robert Mitchum

questions.question: What was Jim Careys characters last name in Liar Liar?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Reede

questions.question: What was the name of the featured family in the film My Big Fat Greek Wedding?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Portokalos

questions.question: I sent a foul demon back to hell battling him through a seemingly infinite fall and lived to tell about it. Who am I?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gandalf

questions.question: In a galaxy far, far away, I killed a twenty foot, drooling monster with a door. Who am I?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Luke Skywalker

questions.question: I escaped a giant rolling boulder by running through twenty feet of spider webs. Who am I?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Indiana Jones

questions.question: The words Stick that in your trophy case were said by both Burt Reynolds and Adam Sandler in The Longest Yard and its 2005 remake, respectively.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Character and Actor
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, line. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: By what other name is Star Wars character Darth Tyrannus known?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Count Dooku

questions.question: The character of Dennis Nedry gets killed when he stumbles onto a group of this type of dinosaur which spit toxic saliva.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dilophosaur

questions.question: Which of these Star Wars heroes was a former Imperial Officer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Han Solo

questions.question: Who delivered the following movie quote: Im gonna change you from a rooster to a hen with one shot!!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dolly Parton to Dabney Coleman

questions.question: Star Wars character Darth Sidious was an apprentice of this Sith Lord.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Darth Plagueis

questions.question: All of the dinosaurs in the blockbuster film Jurassic Park were created by computer animation.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In what year was Jurassic Park released on the big screen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1993

questions.question: Which Star Wars character commanded the first Death Star?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grand Moff Tarkin

questions.question: Which of these Star Wars characters is the odd one out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Senator Bail Organa

questions.question: Which actor made the following remark: Wheres my manners? Its 11 oclock; you must be parched.?

options.text: Tom Hanks in The Money Pit
Robin Williams in Good Morning, Vietnam
Bette Midler in Down and Out in Beverly Hills

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Hanks in The Money Pit

questions.question: James Earl Jones, who voiced Darth Vader, also provided the voice of a character in which of the following Disney movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Lion King

questions.question: Which planet featured in Star Wars was renamed Imperial Center?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Coruscant

questions.question: Which of these Star Wars characters is not part of the Skywalker bloodline?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Han Solo

questions.question: The following movie line was said by which actress: Why dont you just say This is the police! and it will open right up!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stella Stevens to Ernest Borgnine

questions.question: Who is the Clone Commander of the 501st legion in the Star Wars movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cody

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Cocktail
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, villain, country. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The movie Suspiria was about a fancy ballet academy run by a coven of witches.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the movie Cocktail, Jordans family was extremely wealthy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Jurassic Park was built on a secluded island in this country.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Costa Rica

questions.question: At the end of the movie Cocktail, it is revealed that Jordan is going to have twins.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What 2003 movie plot consisted of a fast spreading virus that locked its victims into a permanent state of murderous rage?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 28 Days Later

questions.question: What is the unusual name of the character played by actress Gina Gershon in the movie Cocktail?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Coral

questions.question: In the movie Cocktail, the main character played by Tom Cruise is Brian Hannigan.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: This 1927 movie featured a world where civilization was divided between the workers and the thinkers.  Its a silent sci-fi movie produced in Germany by Fritz Lang, and most of the original is permanently lost.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Metropolis

questions.question: Steven Spielberg was so confident in the success of this film that he left post production to George Lucas so that he could make a different film.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In what year did the movie Cocktail premiere?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1988

questions.question: In 1994, the T-Rex in Jurassic Park won the Best Villain award in what movie awards program?

options.text: The Academy of Science Fiction, Fantasy and Horror Films

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: MTV Movie Awards

questions.question: In the movie Cocktail, Brian had a friend and boss named Doug Coughlin. Doug had many wise sayings that he would tell Brian from time to time such as, Bury the dead, they stink up the place. These words of wisdom were known as Coughlins Rule.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What actress plays the role of Jordan Mooney in the movie Cocktail?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elisabeth Shue

questions.question: In 1988 Roddy Piper, Keith David and George Flower starred in this cult favorite about some special sunglasses that let you see the world as it really is.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They Live

questions.question: Which film has the following plot?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: American Beauty

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Car
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, leader. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In this 1985 movie, an eccentric scientist fits a time machine into a DeLorean car.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Back to the Future

questions.question: In the movie 2 Fast 2 Furious, what car did Brian OConner (Paul Walkers character) drive in the opening street race?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nissan Skyline

questions.question: In the 1977 movie Smokie and the Bandit, Burt Reynolds drove a black Ford Taurus.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the movie I, Robot Will Smith drove a very futuristic car designed especially for the movie, by this maker.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Audi

questions.question: This is the car Lara Croft drove in the 2003 movie Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jeep Wrangler Rubicon

questions.question: Only one actor was ranked in the 20 Top Cops for two different roles.  What actor played Lt. Vincent Hanna opposite Robert De Niros Neil McCauley and NYPD Officer Frank Serpico?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Al Pacino

questions.question: Herbie from the movie The Love Bug, is a special car with a mind of its own. Do you know what kind of car Herbie was?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Volkswagen Beetle

questions.question: In the movie Starsky  Hutch, Ben Stiller was behind the wheel of what model and make car?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ford Grand Torino

questions.question: This was the car of the gang leader Clarence Boddicker in the movie RoboCop.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 6000 SUX

questions.question: Shes one of the FBIs most promising rookies and she is very good at solving anagrams.  But she can be vulnerable.  Who is the character that says the following,  I didnt have any food, any water and it was very.... very cold.  I thought if I could save just one....he was so very heavy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Clarice Starling

questions.question: In three of these movies James Bond drove an Aston Martin DB5. Can you spot the odd one?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dr. No

questions.question: Bud White was the Top Cop who took the # 4 position.  He was the police  muscle  that helped solve the  Night Owl case and won the heart of the beautiful Lynn Bracken played by Kim Basinger.  What actor said  You look better than Veronica Lake.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Russell Crowe

questions.question: Yippee-Ki-Yay  *#%^#%  is a quote used by Det. John McClane in which series of police thrillers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Die Hard

questions.question: It started as an ordinary day for SWAT officer Jack Traven but soon Jack was dealing with a madman and no matter how cute the bus driver, Jack just wanted to get off the bus.  Who starred as SWAT officer Jack Traven?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Keanu Reeves

questions.question: This 2005 movie stars Johnny Knoxville, Jessica Simpson and a muscular Dodge Charger.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Dukes of Hazzard

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Red October and Hunt
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, ramius, intelligence. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In The Hunt for Red October, when Ramius meets his officers at dinner to discuss their defection, some of the officers argue that it wasnt too late to go back to the Soviet Union. Ramius dismissed this by saying he dispatched a letter stating their intentions. When asked why, he makes a historical reference to whom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cortez

questions.question: Borodin, Captain Ramius Executive Officer in The Hunt for Red October, tells Ramius of his future plans once they have defected to America. He wants to buy an RV and travel to his future homes in what two U.S. states?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arizona and Montana

questions.question: In The Hunt for Red October Borodin is killed by a KGB agent on board disguised as a cooks assistant. What was the KGB/cooks assistants name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Loginov

questions.question: According to U.S. intelligence, the Red October, a Soviet ballistic missile submarine, featured in the movie The Hunt for Red October, is a member of what submarine classification?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Typhoon Class

questions.question: Captain Tupolev, played by Stellan Skarsgard in the movie The Hunt for Red October, is commander of what Soviet submarine?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kanavelov

questions.question: Fictional character Jack Ryan is flown to what U.S. aircraft carrier to explain the details of what is happening with the Red October?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: U.S.S. Enterprise

questions.question: Admiral Painter, played by Fred Dalton Thompson in The Hunt for Red October, tells Captain Davenport that maybe he shouldnt be so hard on Ryan. He goes on to explain that Ryan served his fourth year of duty in the hospital because of a helicopter crash in what body of water?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mediterranean Sea

questions.question: How many children do Miranda and Daniel have in the movie Mrs. Doubtfire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3

questions.question: In the film The Hunt for Red October, Jack Ryan is asked to give a briefing at the White House. What is the name of the National Security Advisor who is leading the meeting?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jeffrey Pelt

questions.question: Fictional character Jack Ryan tells Captain Ramius that he isnt a Navy officer and that he writes books for the CIA. He tells Ramius that he is the author of which of these books?

options.text: History of the United States Navy
Pearl Harbor: Lessons of a Tragedy

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Fighting Sailor

questions.question: In The Hunt for Red October, Seaman Jones, the sonar expert on the American submarine sent to track the Red October, was a student at what university before joining the Navy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cal Tech

questions.question: In the 1990 movie The Hunt for Red October Jack Ryan wanted to get the Red October to somewhere very deep in the Atlantic to fake its sinking. When he proposes his plan, he is pointing to what oceanic landmark on the map?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Laurentian Abyssal

questions.question: In the movie The Hunt for Red October, the Red October set sail from what Soviet port?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Murmansk

questions.question: Jack Ryan, one of the main characters in The Hunt for Red October, was a graduate from the U.S. Naval Academy. What year did he graduate?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1972

questions.question: In the movie Mrs. Doubtfire, Miranda decides to let the court overturn their decision on Daniel, which in turn, allows him to spend every day with his children. What drives her to this decision?

options.text: He stops drinking and becomes a responsible parent.
He remarries and seems to have a better grip on life and his decision making
He gets a full time job as an airline pilot.
She sees him acting on a television show.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She sees him acting on a television show.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Horror
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, criminals, death. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In this 2003 horror movie Kyle Walsh must confront his troubled past and save his childhood sweetheart and her younger brother from an unrelenting evil.

options.text: The House on the Edge of the Park

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Darkness Falls

questions.question: This movie features a character with a face painted white and with nails all over his head.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hellraiser

questions.question: The protagonist of this slasher movie carries a chainsaw and wears a mask with holes all around?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Friday the 13th

questions.question: In a truly horrifying movie ending Detective William Somerset stands helplessly by as the criminal very calmly announces, It seems that envy is my sin.  What is the name of this quiet, unassuming man of evil?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Doe

questions.question: Who is the cocaine cowboy that barely escapes death by chainsaw, mows down his competition on Ocean Drive and has very unhealthy feelings for his sister? Better get this right or you can say hello to my little friend.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tony Montana

questions.question: When Bob Gale originally wrote Back to the Future, the time machine was which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Refrigerator

questions.question: This film tells the story of Cole Sear, a troubled boy remembered for uttering the words I see dead people.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Sixth Sense

questions.question: In this 2002 horror movie viewers who watch a cursed video tape receive a phone call in which a voice condemns them to death.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Ring

questions.question: In this horror film five-year-old Carol communicates with a group of ghosts.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Poltergeist

questions.question: In this horror movie a six-year-old boy, named Michael Myers, is locked in a mental institution after brutally killing his older sister.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Halloween

questions.question: This horror film focuses on a successful criminal psychologist who awakens to find herself a patient in the mental institution she has worked for.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gothica

questions.question: In this horror movie Drew Barrymores character must answers horror based trivia questions.

options.text: Are You Afraid of the Dark
I Know What You Did Last Summer

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scream

questions.question: In this classic gangster movie Arthur Cody Jarrett scales a gas storage tank and screams Made it Ma, top of the world.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: White Heat

questions.question: Of the 20 Top Criminals, two actors have taken two slots each. One is Kevin Spacey who was rated in the 20th and 4th place. The next actor took the #2 ranking as the young Vito Corleone and the # 4 spot as the fastidious thief Neil McCauley. Can you name this actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert De Niro

questions.question: Michael J. Fox waited for the TV show Family Ties to end before taking on Back to the Future.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False
